thread.title: The Patriots Hype Video Hits Keep Coming with “Mad Tom, Revenge Road”
thread.title_full: The Patriots Hype Video Hits Keep Coming with “Mad Tom, Revenge Road”

author: Jerry Thornton
title: The Patriots Hype Video Hits Keep Coming with “Mad Tom, Revenge Road”
text:
The Patriots Hype Video Hits Keep Coming with “Mad Tom, Revenge Road” Jerry Thornton | Email 
OK, this one didn’t exactly take us down the path I was expecting, going with the “Remember the Titans” sound instead of “Fury Road.” But perfectly edited highlights over Coach Boone speeches is still the kind of Patriots Porn that will have you doing the Kool Aid Man through the locker room walls. 
You keep producing them, we’ll keep posting them. Everyone knows the rules. How soon is kickoff? Jerry Thornton |
